nodes.text: Jason Mical is a contributing writer for the Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Force and Destiny roleplaying series. He contributed content to the Star Wars: Force and Destiny Core Rulebook and Nexus of Power.

Mical's other RPG writing credits include writing projects for All Flesh Must Be Eaten! (contributions to Worlds of the Dead) from Eden Studios, the Crimson Skies Collectible Miniatures Game (card fiction) from WizKids, Pirates of the Spanish Main (card fiction and world development) from WizKids, the Jeremiah d20 Modern RPG from Mongoose Publishing and
DC Adventures Heroes & Villains for Green Ronin Publishing.
He also created the Crescent City RPG, a diceless game system using tarot cards, published in the Beyond the Storm RPG charity compilation to benefit victims of Hurricane Katrina.
